====== DESCRIPTION ======

CALL FOR ARTISTS
Upstream Gallery
Hastings on Hudson, NY
PaperWorks 2019- Theme & Variation
Deadline May 24, 2019. Multiple price options

As artists, most of us find our voices through examining similar ideas over time. Ultimately, these become our ‚Äúthematic materials‚Äù. Upstream Gallery invites artists working on paper or making paper based constructions to submit work from their own practice that speak to the idea of theme and variation for our 7th Annual Juried PaperWorks exhibition. The exhibition will be at Upstream Gallery, Hastings on Hudson, NY from June 27th to July 28th, 2019. Reception: Sunday, June 30th 2-5 pm.

Eligible Work: Artists are invited to submit 2-D or 3-D work that is primarily paper based. Successful entries will demonstrate thematic relationships among two or more pieces. Photography is not eligible for this exhibition; we hold a separate show for photographic work.

Specifications: Maximum framed size may not exceed 20 x 24 inches. Accepted pieces must be able to be hung and properly wired or mounted for hanging. The gallery reserves the right to reject poorly presented pieces.

Jurors:

Antonio Alvarez: Cuban born Alvarez is a both a remarkable abstract painter and a world-renowned art conservator specializing in the restoration of works on paper.

Nancy Egol Nikkal: Nikkal is a graduate of Hunter College in Art with postgraduate work in printmaking. She is a painter who works on canvas and in collage, where she uses papers she paints herself as the foundation for her elegant and witty work.

Rachel Weatherford Whitlow: Whitlow is a graduate of Cooper Union in fine art who also studied painting, lithography and print making at Academie Minerva in Groningen, Netherlands. She is a master printer of both Tamarind and Paris methods of lithography.

Entry Fee: Minimum entry of 3 pieces $45; each additional entry $5 up to a maximum of 6 pieces ($60) The jurors may select two, several, all, or none of your submissions. All pieces must be for sale. The gallery will retain a 30% commission on all sales. To enter please go to:
https://upstreamgallery.submittable.com/submit


IMPORTANT DATES

Deadline for Entries, Friday, May 24th 2019. All entries must be made via Submittable.

Friday, June 21st by 5 pm deadline for delivered work if shipping

Monday, June 24th 10 a.m. to 2 pm: Delivery of artwork to gallery if local;

Thursday, June 27th: Opening of exhibition

Sunday, June 30th, Opening reception ‚Äì 2 to 5 pm

Monday, July 29th, Local Artists pick up work
